attributes.action: Meat imports from the US clearly labelled with the country of origin
attributes.additional_details: Inferior quality of meat products, including well being of the animal, chemical additives and chemicals used in processing.
attributes.background: US products meet the existing food regulations and are clearly marked with their origin.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action:

Require all food of US origin to be labelled for transparency
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727013
